mean_en: the use of science in industry, engineering, etc. to invent useful things or to solve problems; machinery or equipment designed using technology
sentence: Now there are more and more technology products in our lives.
sentence_trans: 现在我们的生活中出现了越来越多的科技产品。
word_etyma: techno技术，能力 + logy学说 → 技术，科技
